title: Watch live: Spacewalk underway for space station maintenance, upgrades
summary: Two astronauts floated outside the International Space Station Wednesday for a spacewalk to install refurbished ammonia jumpers in the lab’s cooling system, to replace a high-definition camera and to make power and data connections on a European instrument platform.

title: Boeing eyes investment candidates at Satellite 2022
summary: Boeing executives are meeting with startups at the Satellite 2022 conference with an eye toward investment and collaboration.

title: Universal connectivity requires extensive collaboration
summary: Within a decade, satellite mobility providers expect to offer customers a seamless transitions between terrestrial and satellite networks.

title: PSN orders Indonesia-focused satellite from Boeing for 2023 launch
summary: Indonesia’s Pasifik Satelit Nusantara (PSN) said March 23 it has ordered a high-throughput satellite from Boeing to launch on a SpaceX Falcon 9 in 2023.

title: ISS astronauts to perform final spacewalk of Expedition 66
summary: Expedition 66 astronauts Raja Chari and Matthias Maurer have ventured outside the International Space Station on Wednesday, performing a spacewalk to carry out repairs and upgrades on the space station.

title: Ursa Space raises $16 million in Series C round
summary: Ursa Space, a geospatial and analytics company, raised $16 million in a Series C round led by Dorilton Ventures.

title: Firefly raises $75 million as it prepares for second launch
summary: Launch vehicle developer Firefly Aerospace has raised $75 million in a new funding round as the company, now under new ownership, prepares for a second launch of its Alpha rocket this spring.

title: SpaceX’s next Crew Dragon astronaut launch slips into April
summary: NASA, SpaceX, and private customer Axiom Space have decided to slightly delay two of the company’s upcoming Crew Dragon launches, both of...

title: Blaming inflation, SpaceX raises Starlink and launch prices
summary: SpaceX has raised prices for both its Starlink broadband service and for dedicated and rideshare launches, in some cases by up to 20%, citing inflation.

title: Ursa Major says its Hadley engine supports vertical launch and hypersonic uses
summary: "Having an engine off the shelf is going to save you five-plus years."
